description: This weekend, Lizzie O'Leary talks with Marketplace's John Sepulvado and record label Kill Rock Stars' Portia Sabin about the supply and demand of the comedy industry ... Fisherman Dean Blanchard tells us about his business off the Gulf Coast in light of a Supreme Court case about grouper fish ... And could you please put your cell phone on silent? Marketplace's Ben Johnson tells us why more venues are banning phones inside.
title: Marketplace Weekend for Friday, October 10, 2014
teaser: This weekend, Lizzie O'Leary talks with Marketplace's John Sepulvado and record label Kill Rock Stars' Portia Sabin about the supply and demand of the comedy industry ... Fisherman Dean Blanchard tells us about his business off the Gulf Coast in light of a Supreme Court case about grouper fish ... And could you please put your cell phone on silent? Marketplace's Ben Johnson tells us why more venues are banning phones inside.
